response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own it for a special price of $750,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the quality and uniqueness of the product. I believe that you will find its value to be well above this amount, making this a worthwhile investment for you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
